Keep Score, Families

For getting there on time. For storing the game-winning video. For sharing with grandparents. Go team.

An app for families who love to compete.

For families who want a way to keep score: events, lists, photos, stories, team members, and everything else for the winning season. Go private. Go team.

For the private post-game wrap up.

For sharing the details with a select few, for grandparents waiting at home to hear who won, for Aunt Gayle her one-time coach, for the sporty cousins who know the game. For family.

Features at a glance

Calendar

For games, practices and the post-season party.

Contacts

For coaches, team members, and the name of that really loud dad.

Photos

For photo albums and videos of the wins and losses.

Notes

For taking note of the score and the funny things we learn from sports.

Documents

For the health forms, the signup forms, the rules and receipts.

Lists

For what to pack, the bottles, the cleats, the gear, the bandages.

Stories

For the coach's end of season story about teamwork and playing hard and heart.

Sharing

For sharing with grandparents, Aunt Gayle, and the Sporty Cousins.

Request an invite for the first comprehensive app designed for your family. Brought to you by Djed, from the heart of Austin, Texas.
